entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Catharines
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 9.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 2:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: 9.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 48 %
Dewpoint: -1.4°C
Wind: SW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low plus 3 with temperature rising to 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 3 with temperature rising to 10 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High 15. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
